registerUser

public static User registerUser(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String verifyPassword)
                         throws TooShortPasswordException,
                                TooShortUsernameException,
                                PasswordsDoNotMatchException,
                                UsernameExistsException,
                                PasswordRequirementException
This method tries to register a new user

Parameters:
username - Desired username
password - Desired password
verifyPassword - Verification of the desired password
Returns:
The created user instance
Throws:
TooShortPasswordException - Thrown if the given password is too short
TooShortUsernameException - Thrown i the given username is too short
PasswordsDoNotMatchException - Thrown i the password verification fails
UsernameExistsException - Thrown i the username already exists
PasswordRequirementException

changePassword

public static void changePassword(User user,
                                  java.lang.String currentPassword,
                                  java.lang.String newPassword,
                                  java.lang.String verifiedNewPassword)
                           throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                                  TooShortPasswordException,
                                  PasswordsDoNotMatchException,
                                  PasswordRequirementException
Change the password of the given user. Verifies that the new password meets all the set conditions.

Parameters:
user - User object for which we want to change the password
currentPassword - Current password
newPassword - Desired new password
verifiedNewPassword - New password verification
Throws:
InvalidCredentialsException - Thrown if the current password is incorrect
TooShortPasswordException - Thrown if the new password is too short
PasswordsDoNotMatchException - Thrown if the password verification fails
PasswordRequirementException

user - An instance of the User object
